SEARCH
Package is.hi.hbv501g.hbv1.controllers

Class QuestionnaireController

java.lang.Object
is.hi.hbv501g.hbv1.controllers.QuestionnaireController
@RestController @RequestMapping(path="api/v1/questionnaire") public class QuestionnaireController extends Object
API to handle QuestionnaireDTO objects. Append /questionnaire to the base URL to access these endpoints.
Since:
2023-09-29
Version:
2.0
Author:
Andri Fannar Kristj√°nsson, afk6@hi.is. Converted to REST API 2024-02-15.

  • Constructor Details

    • QuestionnaireController

      @Autowired public QuestionnaireController(is.hi.hbv501g.hbv1.services.QuestionnaireService questionnaireService, is.hi.hbv501g.hbv1.services.WaitingListService waitingListService)
      Construct a new QuestionnaireController.
      Parameters:
      questionnaireService - QuestionnaireService linked to controller.
      waitingListService - WaitingListService linked to controller.

  • Method Details

    • getAllQuestionnaire

      @RequestMapping(value="/getAll", method=GET) public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ResponseWrapper<List<QuestionnaireDTO>>> getAllQuestionnaire()
      Get all Questionnaires saved to the API. Append /getAll to the base URL to access this endpoint.
      Returns:
      List of all Questionnaire saved to the API as a List of QuestionnaireDTO.

    • getQuestionnaire

      @RequestMapping(value="/get/{id}", method=GET) public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ResponseWrapper<QuestionnaireDTO>> getQuestionnaire(@PathVariable("id") Long id)
      Get a Questionnaire by ID. Append /get/{id} to the base URL to access this endpoint.
      Parameters:
      id - ID of Questionnaire to get.
      Returns:
      QuestionnaireDTO with given ID.

    • getAllQuestionnaireToDisplay

      @RequestMapping(value="/getAllToDisplay", method=GET) public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ResponseWrapper<List<QuestionnaireDTO>>> getAllQuestionnaireToDisplay()
      Get all Questionnaires saved to the API that are marked to be displayed on the request form. Append /getAllToDisplay to the base URL to access this endpoint.
      Returns:
      List of all QuestionnaireDTO saved to the API that are marked be displayed on the request form.

    • createQuestionnaire

      @RequestMapping(value="/create", method=POST) public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ResponseWrapper<QuestionnaireDTO>> createQuestionnaire(@RequestBody QuestionnaireDTO questionnaire)
      Create a new Questionnaire and save it. Append /create to the base URL to access this endpoint.
      Parameters:
      questionnaire - New Questionnaire.
      Returns:
      HTTPStatus 201 on successful save.

    • setDisplayOnForm

      @RequestMapping(value="/setDisplay/{questionnaireID}", method=PUT) public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ResponseWrapper<QuestionnaireDTO>> setDisplayOnForm(@PathVariable("questionnaireID") Long questionnaireID, @RequestParam boolean updatedDisplay)
      Set display for Questionnaire on registration form. Append /setDisplay/{questionnaireID}?updatedDisplay={updatedDisplay} to the base URL to access this endpoint.
      Parameters:
      questionnaireID - ID of Questionnaire to update.
      updatedDisplay - Updated display status of Questionnaire.
      Returns:
      HttpStatus 200.

    • deleteQuestionnaire

      @RequestMapping(value="/delete/{questionnaireID}", method=DELETE) public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ResponseWrapper<QuestionnaireDTO>> deleteQuestionnaire(@PathVariable("questionnaireID") Long questionnaireID)
      Delete a Questionnaire from storage. Append /delete/{questionnaireID} to the base URL to access this endpoint.
      Parameters:
      questionnaireID - ID of Questionnaire to delete.
      Returns:
      HttpStatus 200 if deleted successfully, HttpStatus 409 if Questionnaire has dependencies. HttpStatus 404 if Questionnaire does not exist.

    • updateQuestionnaire

      @RequestMapping(value="/update", method=PUT) public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ResponseWrapper<QuestionnaireDTO>> updateQuestionnaire(@RequestBody QuestionnaireDTO updatedQuestionnaire)
      Update a Questionnaire. Append /update to the base URL to access this endpoint.
      Parameters:
      updatedQuestionnaire - Questionnaire with updated information.
      Returns:
      HttpStatus 200.

    • answerQuestionnaire

      @RequestMapping(value="{requestID}/answerQuestionnaire", method=POST) public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ResponseWrapper<QuestionnaireDTO>> answerQuestionnaire(@PathVariable("requestID") Long requestID, QuestionnaireDTO questionnaire)
      Add Questionnaire answers to a WaitingListRequest. Append /{requestID}/answerQuestionnaire to the base URL to access this endpoint.
      Parameters:
      requestID - ID of WaitingListRequest the answers belong to.
      questionnaire - Questionnaire with answers.
      Returns:
      HTTPStatus 200.
